de.mrapp.android.preference

Interface EditTextPreference.Validator

  • Enclosing class:
    EditTextPreference

    public static interface EditTextPreference.Validator
    Defines the interface, a class, which should be able to validate the text of an EditTextPreference, must implement.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String validate(java.lang.String text)
      Validates the text of an EditTextPreference.

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        java.lang.String validate(java.lang.String text)
        Validates the text of an EditTextPreference.
        Parameters:
        text - The text, which should be validated
        Returns:
        A string, which indicates a validation error or null, if the given text is valid
